response.overview: 12 American military prisoners in World War II are ordered to infiltrate a well-guarded enemy château and kill the Nazi officers vacationing there. The soldiers, most of whom are facing death sentences for a variety of violent crimes, agree to the mission and the possible commuting of their sentences.
response.tagline: Train them! Excite them! Arm them!...Then turn them loose on the Nazis!
response.title: The Dirty Dozen

cast.name: Lionel Murton
cast.character: MP Lt. Col. in charge at hanging (uncredited)

cast.name: Richard Shaw
cast.character: German Officer Who Seals the Bunker (uncredited)
